"Solo Training: Heaven and Hell":
"This is a special training program
aimed at people with outstanding ability.
Only those who can make instant
decisions in solo combat can beat this
simulation. Because of the extremely high
risk involved, an [Extreme Pass] is
required to participate in this mission.

――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated."

"You must pay 1 Extreme Pass
on the Campship."
